QuestData.Title: Blinding the Riverblades
QuestData.Description: "A hooded falcon catches no quarry."$B$BThis is one of the first mantras we teach young monks at the temple. It means that even a foe as swift and lethal as a falcon can be neutralized by depriving its senses.$B$BThe saurok have scouts all over the region acting as eyes for their raiding parties.$B$BIt's time we put their eyes out, don't you think?
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 8 Riverblade Pathstalkers in the areas surrounding Crane Wing Refuge.
QuestData.CompletionText: We cannot risk any more saurok ambushes, but we're in no position to take them on in force. Fortunately, with you here, we shouldn't need to.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done. I only wish I could have accompanied you...$B$BThe blood on these hand-wraps is not my own, you know.
